vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀκατα-στᾰσία, ἡ,
instability, anarchy, confusion, [NT+2nd c.BC+]
__II unsteadiness, τοῦ σώματος[Refs 3rd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef: primarily instability; hence, an unsettled state; disorder, commotion, tumult, sedition; rebellion, riot Lk. 21:9; 1Cor. 14:33; 2Cor. 6:5; 12:20; Jas. 3:16*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: desorden; insurrección (LUC.21:9); maltrato por la violencia de la muchedumbre (2CO.6:5)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 不穩定, 混亂的局面(林後 6:5)
2) (與既有的權威抗衡) 擾亂, 混淆
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 不稳定, 混乱的局面(林后 6:5)
2) (与既有的权威抗衡) 扰乱, 混淆
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự hỗn loạn; sự loạn lạc
